Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Main method that prints out the populated nums array. The array is then sorted and the newly sorted nums is printed out.

Parameters:
args -

sort

public static void sort(int start,
                        int end)
Sort method that sorts the array. A basis condition is set by if the array is one number. If it is, it returns. If not, the smallest integer in the array is set to the first position. Then, a self call is made that inputs the array starting at the position directly after the smallest integer.

Parameters:
start - The starting position.
end - The last position to be sorted.

swap

public static void swap(int x,
                        int y)
Simple method that switches the values of two integers at different positions in the array.

Parameters:
x - The first value to be switched.
y - The second value to be switched.
